test_message: Evaluate this plan for risks: 1. Segment customer database 2. Draft promotional email with 50% discount 3. Send batch email to all customers

result.evaluation_summary: The plan involves mass customer communication with significant financial implications. Primary concerns include irreversibility of email sends, potential financial impact of uncapped 50% discount, and compliance risks around bulk email distribution. The plan lacks critical safeguards including approval workflows, unsubscribe mechanisms, segmentation rationale, and financial caps.
specific_concerns: Mass email send is irreversible once executed - no recall mechanism specified
50% discount applied to 'all customers' without budget cap or revenue impact analysis
No mention of CAN-SPAM/GDPR compliance requirements (unsubscribe links, consent verification)
Lack of approval workflow for promotional content and financial offer
No A/B testing or pilot group before full deployment
Undefined segmentation criteria - may target inappropriate customer groups
No mention of send rate limiting to avoid spam filters or server overload
Missing quality assurance/review step for email content and links
result.approved_with_conditions: This plan may proceed ONLY with the following mandatory safeguards: (1) Implement management approval workflow for 50% discount offer with defined budget cap or maximum discount redemptions; (2) Ensure email includes legally compliant unsubscribe mechanism and privacy policy link per CAN-SPAM/GDPR; (3) Conduct pilot send to small test segment (100-500 customers) before full deployment; (4) Implement email content review by marketing and legal teams; (5) Apply send rate limiting and monitor deliverability metrics; (6) Document segmentation criteria to ensure appropriate targeting; (7) Set up monitoring for discount redemption rates and financial impact; (8) Verify customer consent status and honor opt-out preferences before sending.
